name: Train Too Loaded
description:
We are train company that take item crate that dropped from sky. Why it come from sky. Because it all hot stuff and illegal. This is your first day as train trainee assistant! First you must get all the crate needed.

Yep, but keep in mind. We are train company that also doing..you know..train company stuff. So there will be limited space. So be prepare to have a RUNNING OUT OF SPACE for our lovely dangerous crate. After you fulfill all the need of stuff. Well we can store a small amount of crate for extra income but remember not to overload the second carriage which is the landing zone. The crate must not exceed the "safe zone level".

Oh yeah, since nobody takes this job normally. So you will have only this one chance to prove that you can work with us. Problem is. If you fail. Well...that's bye-bye for you pal.

One more thing. This time, you can kick the crate. So kick until your heart desire.

Control:
E - Kick
E(hold) - Charge Kick
Left-click box(nearbox) - lift the clicked box
Right-click box(nearbox) - drob the box in front you
R - Restart Game
ps: This game contain only first day(one level) of playing. Remember this your only chance. Good Luck!
